data.title: Grand County, UT - Official Website
data.meta_description: Grand County Elections - Get information on voter registration, candidates, precincts, important dates, election results and more!
data.text:
Notice of Early Voting Times and Drop Box Locations

2024 GENERAL ELECTION - NOVEMBER 5, 2024

Notice to Military and Overseas Voters

Grand County Clerk/Auditor's Office - 435.259.1321 - elections@grandcountyutah.net

The 2024 General Election will be held on Tuesday, November 5, 2024.

Races in the election have yet to be determined. Click above for the sample ballot images.

Ballots will be sent to our military and overseas voters on September 20, 2024.

To request a military or overseas absentee ballot please visit www.fvap.gov

If necessary, our military and overseas voters can visit https://www.fvap.gov/fwab-privacy-notice to obtain a Federal Write-In Absentee Ballot

General Election by-mail ballots will be sent to active voters on October 15, 2024.
